TopicTitle: Twitch.TV now supports KSP as a Category!

Articles.Content:
I have recently checked the list of supported games on the streaming network called Twitch.tv.

To view current KSP streams and watch people on their mission to achieve successful missions!

http://www.twitch.tv/directory/Kerbal%20Space%20Program 8)

Have fun, and stay cool!

-JebThrillMaster

{-EDIT: I know I will be streaming this weekend if im not to busy making addons.}
Weekend is here! Be ready and watch out for lots of streams!
